snippet.title: Dissembler - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Dissembler is a subtle puzzle game about unraveling bold, abstract designs one color at a time.

Coming to iOS, Steam and itch.io on 22 February 2018, and Android a couple weeks later.

Website: http://dissembler-game.com

Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/797620/Dissembler/

Trailer by Jason Poley. Trailer music by Maize Wallin.
